body.name: Portable washing machine,Mini Washer, 11L upgraded large capacity High Power foldable Washer, Hanging drain pipes are more convenient, Deep cleaning of underwear and other small clothes. (grey)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 7 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 52 mins
features: 【Upgraded version 11L large capacity, minimum 40W high power】Based on buyer feedback, we have upgraded the power and capacity as well as drainage. The motor power of the small washing machine reaches a minimum of 40W, and the super large capacity of 11L can accommodate nearly twice as much clothing as 6L. The power and capacity are increased at the same time, making laundry easier. We are not the old type of drainage with plugs and pipes. Ours is a bottom drain, and a drain pipe has a hook that can be hung on the side of the washing machine. There is no need to remove plugs and connect drain pipes, and there will be no leakage everywhere.

【Foldable Design - Easy to Operate】This small portable washing machine adopts a foldable design, measuring 11.8x11.8x11.8 inches when unfolded and 11.8x11.8x4.7 inches when folded. It is easy to store and can be easily placed between shelves or under the bed. It can be placed in a suitcase or car when traveling. It does not take up much space and is always with you, so that you are not tired during the journey. The folding washing machine has a semi-automatic cleaning function and has 3 mode timer buttons of 3 minutes, 5 minutes and 10 minutes, allowing you to easily complete various washing requirements (PS. Fill the washing machine with 2/3 of water to achieve better washing Effect)

【Portable Folding Washing Machine】The body has a net weight of 3.9 pounds, compact and easy to carry, perfect for your apartment, dormitory, hotel, travel or camping! The mini washing machine provides a full range of imitation hand washing, suitable washing speed, powerful decontamination, and blue light. It is very suitable for washing small items of clothing such as baby clothes, underwear or socks. The portable washing machine is made of TPE silicone material to protect the health of you and your family! The simple and elegant appearance is your ideal gift choice!

【Instructions for purchase and use】Let you buy with confidence 1: Our portable folding washing machine has increased capacity and motor, and the sound of the product running will be slightly louder than that of small capacity. 2: The capacity of the product you purchased is 11L and the motor is 40w [The capacity and motor of the product will not be exaggerated] 3: The touch button is like a mobile phone screen and is difficult to use when there is water. If the touch button cannot be used, wipe off the water on the surface of the button and it can be used normally.

【Replacement Only No Repair Within 1 Year】 Our portable washing machine comes with 1 year warranty [Replacement Only No Repair] If you have any questions, please contact us and we will provide you with satisfactory customer service. Contact Us - Log in to your Amazon account > Select "Your Orders" > Find the order ID > Click "Contact Seller" and we will get back to you promptly.

[Purchase Instructions] This product is a portable small washing machine, suitable for socks, underwear, and small baby clothing. It is not suitable for large items of clothing. If you forcefully clean large items of clothing, the washing machine will not run smoothly and it will be very laborious. The wire of the washing machine is 53 inches long. Please measure your socket and the location of the washing machine before purchasing to avoid insufficient wires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Description says it’s larger than the typical 5L ones. It is not. It’s 4/5L. Kinda peeved off about the blatant lies on the product description.In the video I put in 3 pairs of wool socks and it struggled to agitate. But that’s ok, cause low agitation is needed on delicates. However, because I was expecting it to be 11L as advertised….my wash time has doubled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Shipped quickly. No instructions were needed as it was so easy to use. Quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is so useless
reviews.reviewText: This product is so horrible it’s not even worth the purchase. You can probably only wash one garment at a time. The tray is so tiny. Do not buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fine version of something that's REALLY needed.
reviews.reviewText: Living with a grown, nonspeaking son with very severe autism has its high and low moments. One of the lows is bathroom accidents. Cleaning soiled undies is a horrible, horrible task. Being able to send them through this little automatic washing machine a few times before putting them in the family washer is a game-changer. We keep this little machine in the laundry tub. It works, although I don't think there are different "cycles." The "control" panel is just a rigid sticker that covers a spring-loaded switch (it came off because of moisture). But since we don't use the "spin" cycle, it's fine. An on/off switch is all we need.All in all, this is a lifesaver for families whose special-needs loved ones have this problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Front panel is sticker like and was peeling off and I just got it today. Also the cord is very short. No instructions on anything and again cheaply made. You will need an extension cord if you want to place in bathtub. I will still try it out and update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Small Loads
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First impression out of the box, it was very lightweight and compact. So it can be stored even in a small bathroom; just put it under the vanity cabinet. Takes seconds to transform it into a portable 'washing machine.'It has a small capacity, great for underwear, bras, socks, and kitchen towels. From my short experience, I noticed that the smaller the load, the better the washing process. I tested it with my bras and my kids' socks, and I’m very happy. It did a great job; in both cases, everything came out clean. This small washing machine is very effective. You can put the load through a 5 or 10 min cycle. I repeat the cycle twice or more (just to rinse it well) if I put too much detergent the first time and there’s a lot of foam. Then I drain the water. This saves my hands from hand washing, and the clothes come out cleaner.When it comes to dehydrating the clothes, it is very gentle, which makes it perfect for bras. After you lift the outer ring of the dry basket up, just attach it in and make sure the adhesives (they're like suction cups) at the bottom of the machine stick before starting the spin cycle, so the machine doesn't move. I have to mention, the socks didn’t fly out at all, but they weren’t as well drained.Of course, I would have loved to have the chance to have a more potent spin, especially for the socks or towels. However, for that, you would need a stainless steel drum and a more powerful motor. Let's be realistic; this machine is simple and on a budget; therefore, I’m satisfied with the value I got.I would consider its noise low and not bothering. Something I don’t like is the cord (needs to be longer or you need extenction) and the power button. You push it for 2 seconds, and it starts right away at the preinstalled cycle. It doesn’t let you more than a sec to switch to the other cycle, so just push it as much as you need. Also, the touch screen isn't very responsive and doesn’t look of good quality. Hopefully, this will work without problems.Overall, I’m very pleased with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Upgrade Your Small Laundry Game with the Portable Washing Machine
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This Portable Washing Machine is a handy addition to any home. With its 11L upgraded large capacity and high power, it can handle deep cleaning for your underwear and other small clothes. The hanging drain pipes make it more convenient to use. While it can effectively clean several towels, the spin-dry function might not be as powerful as expected. Additionally, there's a learning curve with the water drainage system, so be sure to place the drain pipe securely. It's worth noting that the machine can be a bit noisy during operation. Overall, it's a great solution for small loads of laundry, but it might be on the pricier side if not purchased at a discount.
